homePage.title: Handbooks
homePage.subtitle: Comprehensive guides to artificial intelligence concepts, techniques, and applications. Each handbook provides structured learning from fundamentals to advanced topics with clear explanations and practical examples.

core-ai-fields.title: Core AI Fields
core-ai-fields.subtitle: Fundamental AI concepts and methodologies that form the foundation of artificial intelligence, from basic machine learning to advanced generative models.

ai-for-specific-data-types.title: AI for Specific Data Types
ai-for-specific-data-types.subtitle: Specialized AI techniques and architectures designed for processing different types of data, including text, images, audio, video, and structured information.

autonomous-systems.title: Autonomous Systems
autonomous-systems.subtitle: AI-powered systems that can operate independently, making decisions and taking actions in real-world environments without constant human intervention.

optimization-and-operationalization.title: Optimization and Operationalization
optimization-and-operationalization.subtitle: Tools, techniques, and best practices for efficiently deploying, managing, and optimizing AI systems in production environments.

advanced-algorithmic-approaches.title: Advanced Algorithmic Approaches
advanced-algorithmic-approaches.subtitle: Cutting-edge algorithms and computational methods that push the boundaries of what AI systems can achieve, from evolutionary computation to adversarial learning.

trustworthy-and-ethical-ai.title: Trustworthy and Ethical AI
trustworthy-and-ethical-ai.subtitle: Ensuring AI systems are transparent, fair, secure, and aligned with ethical principles while protecting user privacy and data rights.

ai-in-specific-domains.title: AI in Specific Domains
ai-in-specific-domains.subtitle: Real-world applications of AI across various industries and domains, showcasing how artificial intelligence transforms different sectors.

generative-ai.title: Generative AI
generative-ai.description: Creating new content with AI: text, images, audio, and video generation.

llms.title: Large Language Models
llms.description: Architectures, training strategies, and fine-tuning for modern LLMs.

ml.title: Machine Learning
ml.description: Foundational algorithms, supervised and unsupervised learning, and model evaluation techniques.

agentic-ai.title: Agentic AI
agentic-ai.description: AI agents that can reason, plan, and act autonomously to achieve goals.

dl.title: Deep Learning
dl.description: Neural networks, backpropagation, and advanced architectures for deep learning applications.

rl.title: Reinforcement Learning
rl.description: Agents, environments, rewards, and policy optimization.

self-supervised.title: Self Supervised Learning
self-supervised.description: Learning representations from unlabeled data through pretext tasks and contrastive learning.

representation-learning.title: Representation Learning
representation-learning.description: Learning useful representations of data that capture underlying structure and patterns.

prompt-engineering.title: Prompt Engineering
prompt-engineering.description: Mastering the art of crafting effective prompts and context to guide AI behavior.

nlp.title: Natural Language Processing
nlp.description: Techniques for processing and analyzing human language data with machine learning.

cv.title: Computer Vision
cv.description: From CNNs to Vision Transformers and Stable Diffusion.

audio-ai.title: Audio AI
audio-ai.description: Processing and generating audio with AI: speech recognition, synthesis, and music generation.

multimodal-ai.title: Multimodal AI
multimodal-ai.description: Integrating and processing multiple types of data (text, image, audio) in AI systems.

dl-documents.title: Deep Learning for Documents
dl-documents.description: AI techniques for processing, understanding, and extracting information from documents.

gnn.title: Graph Neural Networks
gnn.description: Neural networks designed to work with graph-structured data and relational information.

knowledge-graphs.title: Knowledge Graphs
knowledge-graphs.description: Structured representations of knowledge using entities, relationships, and semantic networks.

tabular-dl.title: Tabular Deep Learning
tabular-dl.description: Deep learning approaches for structured tabular data and relational databases.

time-series.title: Time Series Forecasting
time-series.description: Predicting future values in sequential data using deep learning and statistical methods.

video-ai.title: Video
video-ai.description: AI for video understanding, generation, and analysis: action recognition, video generation, and temporal modeling.

ai-art.title: AI for Art and Aesthetics
ai-art.description: Creating art, music, and creative content using artificial intelligence.

edge-ai.title: AI for Edge and IoT
edge-ai.description: Deploying AI models on edge devices and Internet of Things systems.

ai-finance.title: AI in Finance
ai-finance.description: Applications of AI in financial services and algorithmic trading.

ai-gaming.title: AI for Gaming
ai-gaming.description: AI techniques for game development: NPCs, procedural generation, and game AI.

ai-healthcare.title: AI in Healthcare
ai-healthcare.description: Transforming healthcare with AI-powered diagnostics and treatment planning.

ai-cybersecurity.title: AI in Cybersecurity
ai-cybersecurity.description: Using AI for threat detection, security analysis, and cyber defense.

robotics-ai.title: Robotics and AI
robotics-ai.description: Combining AI with robotics for autonomous navigation, manipulation, and decision-making.

self-driving-cars.title: Self Driving Cars
self-driving-cars.description: Autonomous vehicle technology: perception, planning, and control systems.

flying-cars.title: Flying Cars
flying-cars.description: AI systems for autonomous aerial vehicles and urban air mobility.

sensor-fusion.title: Sensor Fusion
sensor-fusion.description: Combining data from multiple sensors to improve perception and decision-making in autonomous systems.

recommender-systems.title: Recommender Systems
recommender-systems.description: AI-powered systems for personalized recommendations and content discovery.

mlops.title: MLOps
mlops.description: Best practices for deploying and maintaining machine learning models in production.

automl.title: AutoML
automl.description: Automated machine learning: model selection, hyperparameter tuning, and architecture search.

efficient-ai.title: Efficient AI and Optimization
efficient-ai.description: Techniques for making AI models faster, smaller, and more energy-efficient.

gpu-programming.title: GPU Programming
gpu-programming.description: Programming GPUs for AI workloads: CUDA, optimization, and parallel computing.

genetic-algorithms.title: Genetic Algorithms
genetic-algorithms.description: Evolutionary computation using genetic operators for optimization and search problems.

evolutionary-algorithms.title: Evolutionary Algorithms
evolutionary-algorithms.description: Population-based optimization algorithms inspired by biological evolution.

information-retrieval.title: Information Retrieval
information-retrieval.description: Search systems, ranking algorithms, and retrieval methods for finding relevant information.

adversarial-ml.title: Adversarial Machine Learning
adversarial-ml.description: Understanding and defending against adversarial attacks on machine learning models.

bayesian-ml.title: Bayesian Machine Learning
bayesian-ml.description: Probabilistic approaches to machine learning with uncertainty quantification.

continual-learning.title: Continual Learning
continual-learning.description: Learning continuously from new data without forgetting previously learned knowledge.

federated-learning.title: Federated Learning
federated-learning.description: Training models across decentralized devices while keeping data localized.

xai.title: Explainable AI (XAI)
xai.description: Methods to make AI decisions transparent and interpretable to humans.

ai-ethics.title: AI Ethics and Fairness
ai-ethics.description: Ensuring AI systems are fair, unbiased, and aligned with ethical principles.

machine-unlearning.title: Machine Unlearning
machine-unlearning.description: Techniques for removing specific data or knowledge from trained models.
